contentfulSitePost.heading: React Query Performant and powerful data synchronization for React
contentfulSitePost.subheading: Learn something about React Query with me

content.value: Writing your data fetching logic by hand is on its way out. Just tell React Query where to get your data and how fresh you want to keep it and the rest is automatic. React Query handles caching, background updates and stale data out of the box with zero-configuration.

If you know how to work with promises or async/await, then you already know how to use React Query. There's no global state to manage, reducers to write, or fancy state machines to understand. Just define your function that resolves your data (or throws an error) and the rest is history.
